title: Foolish Jest
effect1: If you deal this card during setup, return it to the box and do not replace it
effect2: Start the game with 1 less plot in the timeline

title: Receive prophesy
effect1: Look at the top plot in your deck, then put it back
effect2: Put 1 plot from your hand face down on your deck

title: Conscript a hostage
effect1: Take 1 gold
effect2: Use the lowest rank plot in the dungeon

title: Revolutionize court fashion
effect1: If you have 3 or less plots in hand, draw 1
effect2: If the highest rank plot is green, use the leftmost plot in the timeline

title: Found a charity
effect1: If you have 3 or less gold, take 3 gold
effect2: Take 1 gold for each lower rank plot

title: Disguise as a peasant
effect1: If there is no lower rank plot, use the top plot in your discard
effect2: Otherwise, revive 1

title: Hire a mercenary
effect1: Pay 1 gold
effect2: Use the lowest rank plot other than this

title: Declare bankruptcy
effect1: Take 1 gold for yellow plot in your deck
effect2: Pay your entire deck

title: Streetfight
effect1: If there is a red plot on top of your discard, use it
effect2: Take gold equal to the time of the top plot in your discard

title: Give fealty
effect1: Pay the highest rank plot's time in gold
effect2: Draw that many

title: Steal from the rich and give to the poor
effect1: Take twice the highest rank plot's time in gold
effect2: Pay 1 gold

title: Rob the wretched
effect1: Use the lowest rank plot in the dungeon
effect2: Take its rank in gold

title: Impersonate a foreign Countess
effect1: Take the highest time plot in the dungeon's time in gold
effect2: Draw 1

title: Appoint a Bailiff
effect1: If there is a yellow plot on top of your discard, use it
effect2: Take 1 gold for each yellow plot in the dungeon

title: Challenge to a duel
effect1: Use the lowest rank green plot twice
effect2: If it has a lower rank, take its rank in gold

title: Appoint a Chancellor
effect1: If there is a green plot on top of your discard, draw 1
effect2: Revive 1

title: Smuggle contraband
effect1: Put the top plot in your discard face down on top of your deck
effect2: If there is no red plot, take 4 gold

title: Jailbreak
effect1: Use the highest rank green plot in the dungeon
effect2: Use the highest rank yellow plot in the dungeon

title: Secretly author plays
effect1: Use the lowest rank green plot other than this
effect2: If there is no other green plot, revive 2

title: Dig a silver mine
effect1: If the top plot in your discard is green or red, pay it
effect2: Take 3 gold for each plot rank 3 or lower

title: Kidnap the Judge
effect1: Use the lowest rank green plot in the dungeon
effect2: If there is a red plot on top of your discard, take 1 gold

title: Reclaim your rights
effect1: If there is a green plot on top of your discard, use it
effect2: Revive 2

title: Hold a market fair
effect1: If the leftmost and second leftmost plot in the timeline are different colors, draw 2
effect2: If the leftmost and rightmost plot in the timeline are different colors, take 2 gold

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
effect1: Use the lowest rank yellow plot
effect2: If there is no yellow plot, use the lowest rank plot in the dungeon

title: Found a secret order
effect1: Flip your deck and put it on your discard
effect2: If you have 3 or less plots in hand, revive 1 for each plot in the dungeon

title: Steal the diamond
effect1: If your deck or discard is empty, take 7 gold
effect2: Otherwise, pay your entire hand

title: Appoint a Sheriff
effect1: If you have 5 or less gold, use the highest rank plot in the dungeon
effect2: Take 1 gold for each lower rank plot in the dungeon

title: Bribe the Judge
effect1: Pay 1 gold
effect2: Revive 1 for each green plot in the dungeon

title: Embezzle funds
effect1: If there is a yellow plot on top of your discard, take 5 gold
effect2: Revive 1 for each yellow plot in the dungeon

title: Torture the spymaster
effect1: Use the highest rank plot in the dungeon
effect2: Revive as many as it has time

title: Excommunicate the Cardinal
effect1: If the top plot of your discard is red or yellow, pay it
effect2: If 1 of the 2 leftmost plots in the timeline are green, but not both, revive 4

title: Charter an adventuring company
effect1: If there is no red plot, draw 3
effect2: If there is a green plot, take 3 gold

title: Dub a Dame in shining armor
effect1: Use the top plot of your discard
effect2: Revive 1

title: Fashion a crown
effect1: Pay 5 gold
effect2: Draw 5

title: Control the guilds
effect1: If there is a yellow plot on top of your discard, use it
effect2: Take 1 gold for each plot rank 5 or above

title: Start a riot
effect1: If the top plot of your discard is green or yellow, pay it
effect2: Use the lowest rank green plot

title: Become the Queen of Thieves
effect1: Revive 3
effect2: Take 1 gold for each plot in the dungeon

title: Collect rents
effect1: Take 1 gold for each plot rank 5 or lower
effect2: Draw 3

title: Organize a mutiny
effect1: Use the highest rank plot other than this
effect2: If it is red, draw 3

title: Marry the Duke
effect1: If you have 5 or less gold, use the leftmost plot in the timeline twice
effect2: Otherwise, draw 3

title: Confiscate estates
effect1: Take 2 gold for each plot in the dungeon
effect2: Pay 1 from your deck

title: Plunder the treasury
effect1: Use the highest rank yellow plot
effect2: Take 2 gold for each yellow plot

title: Move the capital
effect1: Flip your discard and put it on your deck
effect2: Draw 5

title: Issue bonds
effect1: Take the highest rank plot's rank in gold
effect2: If there is a red plot, pay 40 gold

title: Declare martial law
effect1: Use the highest rank green plot
effect2: Use the leftmost green plot in the timeline

title: Choose the next Pope
effect1: Pay 30 gold
effect2: Revive 10

title: Blackmail her Majesty
effect1: Take the highest rank plot in the dungeon's rank in gold
effect2: Take the top plot in your discard's rank in gold

title: Storm the Palace
effect1: Use the highest rank green plot
effect2: If there is 1 and only 1 green plot, draw 10

title: Enclose peasant land
effect1: Pay 1 gold
effect2: Draw your entire deck

title: Invest a Bishop
effect1: Take 30 gold for each plot rank 30 or above
effect2: Revive until you have 10 or more plots in hand

title: Declare independence
effect1: Take 10 times as much gold as you have
effect2: Use the highest rank plot other than this

title: Privilege
effect1: Take 1 gold
